Hello !

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: On September 02, 2010, Les Champs Libres suggested where this photo was taken, and they were right!

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Hi Les Champs Libres. We transcribed Goodyear's captions, as written in the early 20th century -- Rheims was the traditional English spelling of the city's name that he used.  I added a tag for Reims, though, so the current spelling can be found. Thanks for your comment and glad you like our pix! Deb Wythe, Digital Lab
